mapper.select: SELECT SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CKEYUSER, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CNOMEUSER, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CCOGNUSER, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CINDEMAIL, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CCODFISC, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CUSRABIL, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_GDATAREG, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_GDATASCAD, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_GSCADCREDEN, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_NNUMTENTIVI, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_GULTIMOTENT, CONCAT(SEAPPLTB.SEAPPL_CCODAPP,'_')||COALESCE(CONCAT(SEMODUTB.SEMODU_CCODMODU,'_'),'') || COALESCE(CONCAT(SEFUNZTB.SEFUNZ_CCODFUN,'_'),'') || COALESCE(SESFUNTB.SESFUN_CCODSFU,'') as authority FROM SEUSERTB INNER JOIN SEUTECTB ON SEUTECTB.SEUSER_CKEYUSER=SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CKEYUSER INNER JOIN SEGRUUTB ON SEGRUUTB.SEUTEC_CKEYUTEC=SEUTECTB.SEUTEC_CKEYUTEC INNER JOIN SEGRUPTB ON SEGRUPTB.SEGRUP_CKEYGRUP=SEGRUPTB.SEGRUP_CKEYGRUP INNER JOIN SELGFNTB ON SELGFNTB.SEGRUP_CKEYGRUP=SEGRUPTB.SEGRUP_CKEYGRUP INNER JOIN SELFNSTB ON SELFNSTB.SELFNS_CKEYLFNS=SELGFNTB.SELFNS_CKEYLFNS INNER JOIN SEAPPLTB ON SEAPPLTB.SEAPPL_CKEYAPPL=SELFNSTB.SEAPPL_CKEYAPPL INNER JOIN SEMODUTB ON SEMODUTB.SEMODU_CKEYMODU=SELFNSTB.SEMODU_CKEYMODU INNER JOIN SEFUNZTB ON SEFUNZTB.SEFUNZ_CKEYFUNZ=SELFNSTB.SEFUNZ_CKEYFUNZ INNER JOIN SESFUNTB ON SESFUNTB.SESFUN_CKEYSFUN=SELFNSTB.SESFUN_CKEYSFUN WHERE SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CUSERNAME = #{username}

SELECT SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CKEYUSER, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CNOMEUSER, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CCOGNUSER, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CINDEMAIL, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CCODFISC, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CUSRABIL, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_GDATAREG, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_GDATASCAD, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_GSCADCREDEN, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_NNUMTENTIVI, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_GULTIMOTENT, SECUSTTB.SECUST_CKEYCUST, SEGRUPTB.SEGRUP_CKEYGRUP, SEUTECTB.SEUTEC_COPERINS, SEUTECTB.SEUTEC_GDATAINS, SEUTECTB.SEUTEC_COPEUVAR, SEUTECTB.SEUTEC_GDATUVAR, SECUSTTB.SECUST_CKEYCUST, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CKEYUSER, SEGRUUTB.SEGRUU_CKEYGRUU, SEGRUPTB.SEGRUP_CKEYGRUP FROM SEUSERTB INNER JOIN SEUTECTB ON SEUTECTB.SEUSER_CKEYUSER=SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CKEYUSER INNER JOIN SEGRUUTB ON SEGRUUTB.SEUTEC_CKEYUTEC=SEUTECTB.SEUTEC_CKEYUTEC INNER JOIN SEGRUPTB ON SEGRUPTB.SEGRUP_CKEYGRUP=SEGRUUTB.SEGRUP_CKEYGRUP INNER JOIN SECUSTTB ON SECUSTTB.SECUST_CKEYCUST=SEUTECTB.SECUST_CKEYCUST WHERE SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CUSERNAME=#{chiavePrimariaTabellaUsers}

SELECT SEPWRDTB.SEPWRD_CPASSWORD FROM SEPWRDTB INNER JOIN SEUSERTB ON SEPWRDTB.SEUSER_CKEYUSER=SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CKEYUSER INNER JOIN SEUTECTB ON SEUTECTB.SEUSER_CKEYUSER=SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CKEYUSER INNER JOIN SECUSTTB ON SECUSTTB.SECUST_CKEYCUST=#{customerId} WHERE SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CUSERNAME = #{username}

SELECT SEGRUPTB.SEGRUP_CKEYGRUP, SEGRUPTB.SEGRUP_CCODGRUPPO, SEGRUPTB.SEGRUP_CDESGRUPPO, SEGRUPTB.SEGRUP_COPERINS, SEGRUPTB.SEGRUP_GDATAINS, SEGRUPTB.SEGRUP_COPEUVAR, SEGRUPTB.SEGRUP_GDATUVAR, SEGRUPTB.SECUST_CKEYCUST, FROM SEGRUPTB ORDER BY SEGRUP_CCODGRUPPO

SELECT SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CKEYUSER, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CNOMEUSER, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CCOGNUSER, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CINDEMAIL, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CUSRABIL, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_GDATAREG, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_GDATASCAD, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_GSCADCREDEN, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_NNUMTENTIVI, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_GULTIMOTENT, SECUSTTB.SECUST_CKEYCUST, SEGRUPTB.SEGRUP_CKEYGRUP, SEUTECTB.SEUTEC_COPERINS, SEUTECTB.SEUTEC_GDATAINS, SEUTECTB.SEUTEC_COPEUVAR, SEUTECTB.SEUTEC_GDATUVAR, SECUSTTB.SECUST_CKEYCUST, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CKEYUSER, SEGRUUTB.SEGRUU_CKEYGRUU, SEGRUPTB.SEGRUP_CKEYGRUP FROM SEUSERTB INNER JOIN SEUTECTB ON SEUTECTB.SEUSER_CKEYUSER=SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CKEYUSER INNER JOIN SEGRUUTB ON SEGRUUTB.SEUTEC_CKEYUTEC=SEUTECTB.SEUTEC_CKEYUTEC INNER JOIN SEGRUPTB ON SEGRUPTB.SEGRUP_CKEYGRUP=SEGRUUTB.SEGRUP_CKEYGRUP INNER JOIN SECUSTTB ON SECUSTTB.SECUST_CKEYCUST=SEUTECTB.SECUST_CKEYCUST WHERE SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CKEYUSER!='admin' AND SECUSTTB.SECUST_CKEYCUST=#{customerId} ORDER BY SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CKEYUSER

SELECT COUNT(SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CKEYUSER) FROM SEUSERTB INNER JOIN SEUTECTB ON SEUTECTB.SEUSER_CKEYUSER=USERS.EUSERTB.SEUSER_CKEYUSER WHERE EUSERTB.SEUSER_CKEYUSER <> 'admin' AND CEUTECTB.SEUSER_CKEYUSER=#{customerId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SEUSERTB (SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CKEYUSER, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CUSERNAME, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CCODFISC, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CCOGNUSER, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CNOMEUSER, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_GDATNASCITA, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CCOMUNASCITA, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_DNASCEST, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CCODTIPDOC, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_DNUMERODOC, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_DDESCENTE, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_GDATARILA, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_DRESESTERO, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CINDIRIZZO, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CCOMUNE, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CFRAZIONE, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CCAPCOMFISC, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CPROVINCIA, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CTELEFONO, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CCELLULARE, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CINDEMAIL, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CPECDELEG, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CFLAGGIUR, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CFISCPIVAAZI, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CDENOMIN, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_DSEDEESTERO, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CINDAZIENDA, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CCOMUAZIE, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CFRAZAZIE, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CCAPAZIEN, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CPROVAZIEN, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CTELEFONOAZI, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CNUMEROFAX, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CEMAILAZI, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CPECAZIENDA, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CUSRABIL, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_GDATAREG, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_GDATASCAD, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_GSCADCREDEN, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_NNUMTENTIVI, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_GULTIMOTENT, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_GULTIMOACC, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_COPERINS, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_GDATAINS, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_COPEUVAR, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_GDATUVAR ) VALUES (#{chiavePrimariaTabellaUsers}, #{username}, #{codiceFiscale}, #{lastName}, #{firstName}, #{dataPersonaFisicaODelegato}, #{comuneNascitaPersonaFisicaODelegato}, #{indicaSeNascitaAllEstero}, #{tipoDocumento}, #{numeroDocumento}, #{descrizioneEnteCheRilasciaIlDocumento}, #{dataRilascioDocumento}, #{indicaSeIndirizzoAllEstero}, #{indirizzoPersonaFisicaODelegato}, #{comuneFiscalePersonaFisicaODelegato}, #{frazioneDelComuneFiscalePersonaFisicaODelegato}, #{ilCAPDelComuneFiscalePersonaFisicaODelegato}, #{provinciaDelComuneFiscalePersonaFisicaODelegato}, #{numeroTelefonicoPersonaFisicaODelegato}, #{numeroCellularePersonaFisicaODelegato}, #{email}, #{eMailPECDelDelegatoPersonaFisica}, #{naturaGiuridicaDellUtenza}, #{codiceFiscalePIVADellAzienda}, #{denominazioneAzienda}, #{indicaSeSedeAllEstero}, #{indirizzoAzienda}, #{comuneFiscaleAzienda}, #{frazioneDelComuneFiscaleDellAzienda}, #{ilCAPFiscaleDellAzienda}, #{provinciaDelComuneFiscaleDellAzienda}, #{numeroTelefonicoAzienda}, #{numeroFaxAzienda}, #{eMailAzienda}, #{eMailPECAzienda}, #{indicaSeUtenzaAbilitata}, #{dataRegistrazione}, #{dataScadenzaUser}, #{dataScadenzaCredenziali}, #{attempts}, #{lastAttempt}, #{dataUltimoAccesso}, #{operatoreInserimento}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{operatoreUltimaVariazione}, #{dataUltimaVariazione} )
mapper.update: UPDATE SEUSERTB SET SEUSER_NNUMTENTIVI=SEUSER_NNUMTENTIVI+1 , SEUSER_GULTIMOTENT=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE SEUSER_CUSERNAME=#{username}
UPDATE SEUSERTB SET SEUSERTB.SEUSER_NNUMTENTIVI=SEUSERTB.SEUSER_NNUMTENTIVI+1 , SEUSER_GULTIMOTENT=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CUSERNAME=#{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SEGRUUTB(SEGRUU_CKEYGRUU,SEGRUU_COPERINS,SEGRUU_GDATAINS,SEGRUU_COPEUVAR,SEGRUU_GDATUVAR,SEGRUP_CKEYGRUP,SEUTEC_CKEYUTEC) SELECT ?????????,'CAS',CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,#{chiavePrimariaTabellaUsers},SEUTEC_CKEYUTEC FROM SEGRUPTB WHERE SEGRUPTB.SEGRUPTB='users'

INSERT INTO SEGRUUTB (SEGRUU_CKEYGRUU, SEGRUU_COPERINS,SEGRUU_GDATAINS,SEGRUU_COPEUVAR,SEGRUU_GDATUVAR,SEGRUP_CKEYGRUP,SEUTEC_CKEYUTEC) VALUES(#{chiavePrimariaTabellaGruppiUtenti},#{operatoreInserimento},CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,#{operatoreUltimaVariazione},CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,(SELECT SEGRUPTB.SEGRUP_CKEYGRUP FROM SEGRUPTB WHERE SEGRUP_CKEYGRUP=#{chiavePrimariaDellaTabellaGruppi}),#{chiavePrimariaDellaTabellaUtentiClienti})
mapper.update: UPDATE SEGRUUTB SET SEGRUUTB.SEGRUP_CKEYGRUP=(SELECT SEGRUPTB.SEGRUP_CKEYGRUP FROM SEGRUPTB WHERE SEGRUPTB.SEGRUP_CCODGRUPPO=#{chiaveGruppo}), SEGRUU_GDATUVAR=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE SEGRUUTB.SEUTEC_CKEYUTEC=#{chiavePrimariaDellaTabellaUtentiClienti}
UPDATE SEPWRDTB SET SEPWRDTB.SEPWRD_CPASSWORD = #{passwordValidaDellUtenza}, SEPWRD_GDATUVAR=CURRENT_TIMESTMP WHERE SEUSER_CKEYUSER = #{chiavePrimariaTabellaUsers}
UPDATE SEUSERTB SET SEUSERTB.SEUSER_GSCADCREDEN = SYSDATE +30 WHERE SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CKEYUSER = #{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SEPWRDTB (SEPWRD_CKEYPWRD, SEPWRD_CPASSWORD, SEPWRD_CPASSWOLD, SEPWRD_CPASSOLDO, SEPWRD_COPERINS, SEPWRD_GDATAINS, SEPWRD_COPEUVAR, SEPWRD_GDATUVAR, SEUSER_CKEYUSER) VALUES (#{chiaveTabellaDellePasswordDellUtenza}, #{passwordValidaDellUtenza}, #{ultimaPasswordValidaDellUtenza}, #{penultimaPasswordValidaDellUtenza}, #{operatoreInserimento}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{operatoreUltimaVariazione}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{chiavePrimariaTabellaUsers})
mapper.select: SELECT SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CKEYUSER, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CNOMEUSER, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CUSERNAME, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CCOGNUSER, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CINDEMAIL, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CCODFISC, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CUSRABIL, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_GDATAREG, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_GDATASCAD, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_GSCADCREDEN, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_NNUMTENTIVI, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_GULTIMOTENT, SEUTECTB.SECUST_CKEYCUST, CONCAT(SEAPPLTB.SEAPPL_CCODAPP,'_')||COALESCE(CONCAT(SEMODUTB.SEMODU_CCODMODU,'_'),'') || COALESCE(CONCAT(SEFUNZTB.SEFUNZ_CCODFUN,'_'),'') || COALESCE(SESFUNTB.SESFUN_CCODSFU,'') as authority FROM SEUSERTB INNER JOIN SEUTECTB ON SEUTECTB.SEUSER_CKEYUSER=SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CKEYUSER AND SEUTECTB.SECUST_CKEYCUST=#{customerId} INNER JOIN SEGRUUTB ON SEGRUUTB.SEUTEC_CKEYUTEC=SEUTECTB.SEUTEC_CKEYUTEC INNER JOIN SEGRUPTB ON SEGRUPTB.SEGRUP_CKEYGRUP=SEGRUPTB.SEGRUP_CKEYGRUP INNER JOIN SELGFNTB ON SELGFNTB.SEGRUP_CKEYGRUP=SEGRUPTB.SEGRUP_CKEYGRUP INNER JOIN SELFNSTB ON SELFNSTB.SELFNS_CKEYLFNS=SELGFNTB.SELFNS_CKEYLFNS INNER JOIN SEAPPLTB ON SEAPPLTB.SEAPPL_CKEYAPPL=SELFNSTB.SEAPPL_CKEYAPPL INNER JOIN SEMODUTB ON SEMODUTB.SEMODU_CKEYMODU=SELFNSTB.SEMODU_CKEYMODU INNER JOIN SEFUNZTB ON SEFUNZTB.SEFUNZ_CKEYFUNZ=SELFNSTB.SEFUNZ_CKEYFUNZ INNER JOIN SESFUNTB ON SESFUNTB.SESFUN_CKEYSFUN=SELFNSTB.SESFUN_CKEYSFUN WHERE SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CUSERNAME = #{username}

SELECT SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CKEYUSER, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CNOMEUSER, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CUSERNAME, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CCOGNUSER, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CINDEMAIL, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CCODFISC, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CUSRABIL, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_GDATAREG, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_GDATASCAD, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_GSCADCREDEN, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_NNUMTENTIVI, SEUSERTB.SEUSER_GULTIMOTENT, SEUTECTB.SECUST_CKEYCUST, CONCAT(SEAPPLTB.SEAPPL_CCODAPP,'_')||COALESCE(CONCAT(SEMODUTB.SEMODU_CCODMODU,'_'),'') || COALESCE(CONCAT(SEFUNZTB.SEFUNZ_CCODFUN,'_'),'') || COALESCE(SESFUNTB.SESFUN_CCODSFU,'') as authority FROM SEUSERTB INNER JOIN SEUTECTB ON SEUTECTB.SEUSER_CKEYUSER=SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CKEYUSER INNER JOIN SECUSTTB ON SECUSTTB.SECUST_CKEYCUST=SEUTECTB.SECUST_CKEYCUST INNER JOIN SEAPPCTB ON SEAPPCTB.SECUST_CKEYCUST=SECUSTTB.SECUST_CKEYCUST INNER JOIN SEAPPLTB ON SEAPPLTB.SEAPPL_CKEYAPPL=SEAPPCTB.SEAPPL_CKEYAPPL INNER JOIN SEGRUUTB ON SEGRUUTB.SEUTEC_CKEYUTEC=SEUTECTB.SEUTEC_CKEYUTEC INNER JOIN SEGRUPTB ON SEGRUPTB.SEGRUP_CKEYGRUP=SEGRUPTB.SEGRUP_CKEYGRUP INNER JOIN SELGFNTB ON SELGFNTB.SEGRUP_CKEYGRUP=SEGRUPTB.SEGRUP_CKEYGRUP INNER JOIN SELFNSTB ON SELFNSTB.SELFNS_CKEYLFNS=SELGFNTB.SELFNS_CKEYLFNS INNER JOIN SEAPPLTB ON SEAPPLTB.SEAPPL_CKEYAPPL=SELFNSTB.SEAPPL_CKEYAPPL INNER JOIN SEMODUTB ON SEMODUTB.SEMODU_CKEYMODU=SELFNSTB.SEMODU_CKEYMODU INNER JOIN SEFUNZTB ON SEFUNZTB.SEFUNZ_CKEYFUNZ=SELFNSTB.SEFUNZ_CKEYFUNZ INNER JOIN SESFUNTB ON SESFUNTB.SESFUN_CKEYSFUN=SELFNSTB.SESFUN_CKEYSFUN INNER JOIN SETICKTB ON SETICKTB.SETICK_CKEYTICK = #{idTicket} AND SETICKTB.SETICK_CUSERNAME=SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CUSERNAME AND SETICKTB.SETICK_CCODFISC=SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CCODFISC

SELECT SEUSER_CCODFISC FROM SEUSERTB INNER JOIN SEUTECTB ON SEUTECTB.SEUSER_CKEYUSER=SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CKEYUSER INNER JOIN SECUSTTB ON SECUSTTB.SECUST_CKEYCUST=SEUTECTB.SECUST_CKEYCUST INNER JOIN SEAPPCTB ON SEAPPCTB.SECUST_CKEYCUST=SECUSTTB.SECUST_CKEYCUST INNER JOIN SEAPPLTB ON SEAPPLTB.SEAPPL_CKEYAPPL=SEAPPCTB.SEAPPL_CKEYAPPL WHERE SEUSERTB.SEUSER_CUSERNAME=#{username} AND SEAPPLTB.SEAPPL_CKEYAPPL=#{applicationId}
